description:
Not allowing to change the port No.
By default its 8080 but if i change to 80 then unable to start the server
summary: Not allowing to change the port No

description: I suggested for sharing any files

sudo apt -y install weborf-daemon

/etc/weborf.conf
start=auto
basedir=/home/username
# Enables or disables use of CGI support
use-cgi=false
#Enable weborf to send Content-Type header
use-mime=true
user=username
group=username-group
# Directory that will be used for the cached files
cachedir=/var/cache/weborf
# Port used to listen
port=80

more at
https://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/jammy/man5/weborf.conf.5.html
summary: it works better from package weborf-daemon

description: Awesome tool to share files within LAN network. Congrats to the developers ;
